name: pCloud Dark Theme
description:
A dark theme for the pCloud because there was none.

I don't know if it works with pCloud Crypto because I don't have it, so please let me know if it doesn't.
additional_info:
v1.1.1: Fixed the share popup again but it is rly hard for me to upload updates because userstyles.org is getting slower and slower but I'll try to keep this updated.

v1.1.0:  Fixed share popup

v1.0.9:  Fixed Link bookmarks page

v1.0.8:  Fixed Link publinks page

v1.0.7:  Fixed Link page

v1.0.6: Made some Improvements

v1.0.5: Fixed Branding again

v1.0.4: Fixed Branding

v1.0.3: Added the ability to change the color from the audio player.

v1.0.2: Fixed the "invite friends" page.

v1.0.1:  Fixed the Repeat and Replay button.

style_setting_options.label: option 2
style_setting_options.value: body > div.megawrap > div.midContain > div > div.main > div.footer-new > div > div:nth-child(1){display:none;}body > div.megawrap > div.midContain > div > div.main > div.footer-new > div > div:nth-child(2) {display: none;}

style_setting_options.label: dark
